wikipedia_page.main: Phillip Boydell (1896 - 1984) was a British designer and illustrator.

response: The Squander Bug was a World War II propaganda character created by the British National Savings Committee to discourage wasteful spending. Originally designed by freelance illustrator Phillip Boydell for press adverts, the character was widely used by other wartime artists in poster campaigns and political cartoons. It is one of the few propaganda campaigns from World War II to be fully documented from the original concept sketches to the finished adverts.p62, Joseph Darracott and Belinda Loftus, Second World War Posters, HMSO, London, 1972.
* Phillip Boydell (1896-1984), British designer and illustrator
